title: Lobby error
body: So recently I've decided I wanted to begin playing League again as the new preseason came around and I wanted to try it out (been inactive for about 6 or so months) and as I went into the client I proceeded to create a lobby with some friends, but every time I try it comes up with "Something unexpected happened when trying to create your lobby" no matter what mode I choose, if I close the client and come back, wait for a few minutes or even when I get invited to a game by my friends. This has pretty much stumped my attempts on trying to new changes, though I can very occasionally get a game. but that takes a good 10 minutes of constant lobby creation. Wondering if anyone else is having the same issue??

replies.body:
Keep clicking it and it'll work eventually.

Half a dozen tries or more and it'll work.

Yep, I've been having the same issue! Also, I get an error when I try to pick a position in the Draft Pick 5v5. ALSO, I tried playing on my mac and there was a lot of in-game lag (when it was playing just fine on high graphics before this last update)....
Yeah, the client has been really buggy tonight. Not sure what's going on

Yeah, I've been having this problem since preseason start and a little before that as well
 {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
I'm having the same issue, but I can start blind pick normal for some reason.
